title: GFDhd
author: GFDhd
content: I've been looking for something related to Antminer L7 hash board repairs before, but have been to no avail.Today, ZEUS MINING shared "Antminer L7 Hash Board Repair Guide". If a friend needs it, please check the Support page of ZEUS MINING's website.I leave the link to the L7 hash board repair manual:https://www.zeusbtc.com/articles/information/3654-antminer-l7-hash-board-repair-guide

comments.author: MinerMEDIC
comments.body: As a Zeus shill, Imma call bullshat on this(line 1 specifically). Hey, maybe I’m wrong, prove it by linking to products from thanosmining.com, d-central.tech, or parallelminer.com (aliexpress.com or even eBay.com) from now on.Not saying there is absolutely anything wrong with Zeus but sly marketing like this is highly distasteful. This isn’t really new or clever but you have to disclose affiliation if you hope to avoid the backlash.

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: hmm checked op’s posts and most are zeus links for repairing gear.so the op does look like he is trying to help zeus by giving zeus links only.but the info can be helpful.So op gives good info and seems to be directly involved with zeus.I was going to give him a few merits till the second poster mentioned why he didi not like the way the op does the links.

comments.author: o_solo_miner
comments.body: And an L7 got nothing to do with bitcoin, so it is the wrong section anyway.

comments.author: deedeeranged
comments.body: Quote from: philipma1957 on August 23, 2022, 03:38:10 PMhmm checked op’s posts and most are zeus links for repairing gear.so the op does look like he is trying to help zeus by giving zeus links only.but the info can be helpful.So op gives good info and seems to be directly involved with zeus.I was going to give him a few merits till the second poster mentioned why he didi not like the way the op does the links.As MinerMEDIC is a repair shop, according to his sig, it looks to me he wants to put the OP in a bad light and why should the OP point to other links even if he is affiliated or not to ZEUS.I followed the link he provided and to me it looks ok sofar.Checked his previous posts and OP seems to me he is trying to help genuinely so there is no need for MinerMEDIC to come down on OP as to me MinerMEDIC due to his business is biased.

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: deedeeranged on August 24, 2022, 09:07:35 AMQuote from: philipma1957 on August 23, 2022, 03:38:10 PMhmm checked op’s posts and most are zeus links for repairing gear.so the op does look like he is trying to help zeus by giving zeus links only.but the info can be helpful.So op gives good info and seems to be directly involved with zeus.I was going to give him a few merits till the second poster mentioned why he didi not like the way the op does the links.As MinerMEDIC is a repair shop, according to his sig, it looks to me he wants to put the OP in a bad light and why should the OP point to other links even if he is affiliated or not to ZEUS.I followed the link he provided and to me it looks ok sofar.Checked his previous posts and OP seems to me he is trying to help genuinely so there is no need for MinerMEDIC to come down on OP as to me MinerMEDIC due to his business is biased. minermedic clearly states he repairs gear. his name means exactly that.the other person endlessly post zeus links that work but does not state he only links zeus.btw zeus repairs are okay .I was going to merit the op but i looked at his posts and they all simply link to zeus for repairs.it would help if he said he only links to zeus. but as i said zeus has been around and in general has been okay for repairs.
